MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the G65, G66 and G68 areas of Kilsyth, Kirkintilloch and Cumbernauld. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:19pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers have arrived onsite in the Gartshore area to investigate reports of a grounded overhead electricity line. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:24pm on Monday, 19 April 2021
